Keywords: Fantastic Four , Mystical
Real Name: Alejandra Jones
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
CIRCLE OF FOUR: If Ghost Rider hasn't been moved or placed this turn, modify attack and damage +1.
SPIRIT OF VENGEANCE: POWER: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked a friendly character since your last turn. Place Ghost Rider such that she can make a close attack targeting the chosen character, then do so.
SIN MANIPULATION: Poison, Steal Energy.
SAVED BY THE SPIRIT: STOP. Invincible.

February 24, 2021
Goop
Steal Energy and STOP has always been nasty, here you got a 100pt piece that does great damage, great mobility and even has prob. A little expensive at 100pts but she is totally worth it. Probably better at second point line.

OutlawFH
That Spirit of Vengeance trait is nuts, can have her literally show up to save the day from across the map!
